00038 #include "egs_stack_geometry.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 string EGS_StackGeometry::type = "EGS_StackGeometry";
00043 
00044 EGS_StackGeometry::EGS_StackGeometry(const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms,
00045     EGS_Float Tol, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), eps(Tol) {
00046     if( geoms.size() < 2 ) egsFatal("EGS_StackGeometry::EGS_StackGeometry: "
00047           " less than 2 geometries is not mermitted\n");
00048     ng = geoms.size();
00049     g = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [ng]; nmax = 1;
00050     has_rho_scaling = false;
00051     for(int j=0; j<ng; j++) {
00052         g[j] = geoms[j]; g[j]->ref();
00053         int n = g[j]->regions(); if( n > nmax ) nmax = n;
00054         if( !has_rho_scaling ) has_rho_scaling = g[j]->hasRhoScaling();
00055     }
00056     nreg = ng*nmax; is_convex = false;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 EGS_StackGeometry::~EGS_StackGeometry() {
00061     for(int j=0; j<ng; j++)
00062         if( !g[j]->deref() ) delete g[j];
00063     delete [] g;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void EGS_StackGeometry::printInfo() const {
00067     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00068     egsInformation(" geometries:\n");
00069     for(int j=0; j<ng; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00070             g[j]->getName().c_str(),g[j]->getType().c_str());
00071     egsInformation(
00072             "=======================================================\n");
00073 }

00077    " setMedia() methods of the geometry objects that make up this geometry\n");
00078 }

00090 extern "C" {
00091 
00092 EGS_STACKG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00093     if( !input ) {
00094         egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): null input?\n");
00095         return 0;
00096     }
00097     vector<string> gnames; vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> geoms;
00098     int err = input->getInput("geometries",gnames);
00099     if( err || gnames.size() < 2 ) {
00100         egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): missing/wrong 'geometries' input\n");
00101         return 0;
00102     }
00103     for(unsigned int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) {
00104         EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gnames[j]);
00105         if( !gj ) egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): no geometry named %s "
00106                 " defined\n",gnames[j].c_str());
00107         else geoms.push_back(gj);
00108     }
00109     if( geoms.size() < 2 ) {
00110         egsWarning("createGeometry(stack): must have at least 2 geometries\n");
00111         return 0;
00112     }
00113     EGS_Float tol = 1e-4;
00114     err = input->getInput("tolerance",tol);
00115     EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_StackGeometry(geoms,tol);
00116     result->setName(input);
00117     result->setLabels(input);
00118     return result;
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 void EGS_StackGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00123 
00124     vector<int> local_regs;
00125 
00126     // label defined in the stacked geometries
00127     for (int i=0; i<ng; i++) {
00128         local_regs.clear();
00129         g[i]->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
00130         for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
00131             regs.push_back(i*nmax + local_regs[j]);
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     // label defined in self (stack input block)
00136     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00137 
00138 }
